name: Clara Evans
text: I had pizza that was supposed to have lettuce on it with a taco pizza kind of like, the tomatoes were very nasty and cooked. Thats my only complaint, the service was a 4 out of 5 on points! The driver was very nice and very mature and loved her spirit!

name: Amy Jantz
text: Friendly and fast service!! Foods always hot and order is never wrong. My family loves pizza hut!!

name: Jessica Jarvis
text: Convenient location, fast and friendly service, hot and delicious pizza, and great deals and value!

name: Gghh Gggb
text: The marinara sauce was cold, and cheesy bread sticks hard and crunchy almost burnt on the edges, wings were tough

name: Dara Warthen
text: Hot and fresh pizza ready to go at the appointed time. Friendly staff

name: Theresa Klapal
text: Employee was very friendly.  The lack of toppings on the pizza was pathetic.

name: Jaime Norris
text: I usually don't care if a delivery is messed up, we eat it and still always tip. Tonight was an experience that was fixed after 2 hours of us waiting for our food. We ordered online and the text said it was delivering, though we had no food …More

name: Jana Koehn
text: The person that waited on me was very friendly and the pizza was hot and good!

name: Brandy Selfridge
text: Mcpherson Pizza Hut is absolutely great!!! Pulled up to window and the lady opened the window and said my name and handed my food over without even asking! She was on top of it !!!

name: Jimmy Miller
text: I love the pan pizza and it was reasonably priced

name: Katelyn Phillips
text: Every time I’ve gotten pizza it’s been delicious and I’ve never had an order get messed up

name: Lisa Nightingale
text: Food was ready when I got there.  Staff was friendly.

name: Tanner Tubbs
text: Fast decent pizza delivered to your door. What more can you say? Essential service.

name: Christopher Newsome
text: Usually decent customer service although I had one bad experience and they never made it right

name: Kristine Williams
text: I don't care for their pizza since they switched to premade crust and frozen vegetables. We get the ham and cheese sandwich which is good.

name: Kimberly Burgess
text: The pizza was amazing and the service was great to! Definitely recommend this pizza hut to everyone!

name: Aimee Adams
text: Good fresh pizza, good selection of other items. They've been around a long time so I get tired of it sometimes but it's always great pizza, fresh and tastes good when I do get it.

name: Jerry Henson
text: Drive thru got use some help

name: Gregg Veneklasen
text: Ordered delivery to the hotel my family & I were staying at, without asking for plates, silverware, napkins, etc. delivery guy showed up to our room door well prepared with bags of plates, silverware & napkins as well as our order hot & everything correct. Great customer service & Awesome delivery service! Def recommend.

name: Jess Godwin
text: Reliable and convenient. Always friendly and prompt at carryout window.

name: Megan Indorf
text: The store in Mcpherson does great but unfortunately somtimes when we call we get re routed to the customer care call and he is rude and unprofessional and it took him 15 min just to send it to the store !  30 min turned in to one hour !  I will not be calling in my orders! Dominos is my go to now .....

name: Kristine Williams
text: Pizza sucks but they make my ham and cheese sandwich just right every time.

name: Joseph Shipton
text: Ordered a buffalo chicken pizza after almost an hour for delivery we got a bbq chicken pizza, called to let them know about the screw up they offered a $10 discount on our next pizza. Not acceptable being pizza cost $18, they ended up remaking it so after an hour and a half I got the right thing.

name: Jocelyn Lerwick
text: Terrible service. Didn’t get my order for over an hour, and when I did finally get it, it was incorrect. Manager (Sara) did not apologize one time when I called to tell her this, and didn’t seem the least bit concerned or care to make it …More

name: Gail Harter
text: I love their buffet

name: Fullhord 22
text: Great but Domino's is better

name: Kevin Wiegand
text: Very professional courteous staff

name: David Sponsel
text: They were very friendly and quick. I placed my order in the store and it was ready in 15 minutes just like they said it would be.

name: Rebecca Crabtree
text: I ordered a Hawaiian pizza and got pepperoni and pineapple. Hawaiian pizza is ham and pineapple. What the crap

name: Jeffrey White
text: Personal were professional

name: Rick Lane
text: Quick, Correct and Cordial.

name: Chris Shafer
text: Good pizza but greasy

name: Shawn Almquist
text: Delivery is always on time, but it's just Pizza Hut

name: Michelle Thompson
text: Great pizza!
